title: Marksman Change:
body:
"Adding diversity to bot lane" 
so expecting to see diversity and the new marksmen in action today i played 3 games and in order there was:
Vayne
Jinx
Trist

gg diversity 
gg S6 -_-

replies.body:
Yeh I read what they had done and thought it will still be the same 3 picked all the time. They made some decent changes to all of them, but nothing to stop the 3 major ones being picked all day every day, they still have the basic synergy that makes them kick total ass in the right hands.

I mean, the change to Kog, what the fuck is that?

ikr, its so weak. He needs a base 2% hp at least to be able to do something

because he can only just get 1.5% with 200 ad

It is funny how that three champion that you mentioned kind of all receive some form of nerf instead of a buff except Tristana. Vayne silver bolts hurt a lot lesser early game now and vayne AD growth is really bad. Jinx rocket mode decreases her attack speed which is extremely huge of a nerf in early levels.
not really... vayne has a x2 damage min, its like 5 damage difference maybe
They meant diversity in the human resources sense, as in Lucian is going to be OP now.
